 2008-01022008-01-29,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of THOMAS R. SPENCER of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
